title: salvataggio password accesso Thunderbird
content:

title: mail with no text and attachments
content:
Hi in one of our accounts we have created on pc folders where we move important emails sorted for customers, suppliers, banks and so on from around 3 days we checked these email and we found in these folders email with only subject text and no main text and no attachments the emails disappeared are between november 2024 and november 2023 but I repeat only in our folders; in the main inbox mail is all regular

thank you for your help

David

title: Unable to send mail from my outlook account on Thunderbird
content: I've had an outlook account on Thunderbird for years but I now have an issue with sending mail . Incoming mail is OK. I just get incorrect password message. I know password is good as I have reset it online (microsoft 365 account0 and have logged in OK to outlook mail online . I also have the account working OK on iPhone. I'm sort of at my wits end here. Have tried different SMTP server settings. Any help would be appreciated Reade H iMac running 12.6.2 Monterey
